component.name: sendMessage
component.description: Delivers a message to the specified queue

component.name: sendMessageBatch
component.description: Delivers batch messages to the specified queue

component.name: receiveMessage
component.description: Retrieves one or more messages from the specified queue

component.name: changeMessageVisibility
component.description: Changes the visibility timeout of a specified message in a queue

component.name: changeMessageVisibilityBatch
component.description: Changes the visibility timeout of multiple messages

component.name: deleteMessage
component.description: Deletes the specified message from the specified queue

component.name: deleteMessageBatch
component.description: Deletes multiple messages from the specified queue
